trs: Maybe we won’t be destroyed after all.’\footnote{Note that this ‘passive’ idea (to be destroyed) is accomplished through the flexible transitivity system in Moloko. The verb means ‘destroy’ but with the Theme as subject of the verb, the whole clause here expresses a passive idea (Chapter chap:9). }
